title: Privacy Policy
informationWeCollectDescription: When you use our Telegram bot, we store:
apiTokenLabel: Tinkoff Investment API Token - Used for read-only access to your investment portfolio
telegramUserIdLabel: Telegram User ID - Your unique Telegram identifier
connectionTimestampLabel: Connection Timestamp - Date/time of your last connection
fetchPortfolioData: Fetch and display your investment portfolio data within Telegram
maintainSecureConnection: Maintain secure connection between our service and Tinkoff API
dataStorageSecurityDescription: We take your data security seriously. We implement the following measures:
automaticDeletion: Automatic deletion after 30 days of inactivity
dataSharingDescription: We may share your data with:
noThirdParties: No third parties have access to your investment information.
yourRightsDescription: You have the following rights regarding your data:
requestDeletion: Request immediate deletion of your data via our support channel
revokeApiAccess: Revoke Tinkoff API access at any time through Tinkoff's platform
